## Installing the packages 



```{r}
library(readxl)
library(MASS)
library(glmnet)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
data = train_pls1

n = nrow(data)
p = ncol(data) -1

data = data %>% 
  filter_all(all_vars(!is.infinite(.)))

model_lasso = glmnet(x = as.matrix(data[, - (p+1)]), y = data$lukashenko_share, alpha =1)
plot(model_lasso)
```
